short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brighten your new tab with the colorful and playful Pop Art Pikachu live wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This vibrant design reimagines Pikachu in bold, pop art-inspired visuals, adding a creative flair to your browsing experience. Easily access your favorite websites with popular shortcuts, and personalize your tab by adding custom links. Stay on track with the built-in calendar and clock, and search the web effortlessly with your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy a pop art twist on Pikachu with every new tab.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly reach your favorite websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Make your tab truly yours with personalized links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of dates and time at a glance.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Browse seamlessly using your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease via the provided links.
